mapper.insert: INSERT INTO topic (id, topic, cluster_name, permission, write_queue_num, read_queue_num, unit, has_unit_subscription, broker_address, order_type, status_id, create_time, update_time) VALUES (NULL, #{topic}, #{clusterName}, #{permission}, #{writeQueueNum}, #{readQueueNum}, #{unit}, #{hasUnitSubscription}, #{brokerAddress}, #{order}, #{status.id}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE topic SET topic = #{topic}, cluster_name = #{clusterName}, permission = #{permission}, write_queue_num = #{writeQueueNum}, read_queue_num = #{readQueueNum}, unit = #{unit}, has_unit_subscription = #{hasUnitSubscription}, broker_address = #{brokerAddress}, order_type = #{order}, status_id = #{status.id}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
